meanings.definition: The state or quality of being common or ordinary.
meanings.sent1: The commonnesses of the situation made it easy to relate to.
meanings.sent2: The commonnesses of their interests brought them together.
meanings.sent3: The party was filled with such commonnesses that it became a bit boring.
meanings.sent4: In a world full of unique individuals, her commonnesses stood out.
meanings.sent5: The commonnesses of the town were evident in its simple architecture.

meanings.definition: The fact of being shared by or common to two or more parties.
meanings.sent1: The commonnesses between the two groups helped them find common ground.
meanings.sent2: The commonnesses in their beliefs created a strong bond.
meanings.sent3: The commonnesses in their tastes led to a surprising friendship.
meanings.sent4: Their commonnesses in experiences made them understand each other better.
meanings.sent5: The commonnesses in their traditions bridged the gap between them.
